desc: Are you looking for high quality used furniture & antiques in the Wake County area? Craze Furniture delivers in a 40 mile radius around ZIP 27540.

layout.text: Craze Furniture and Antiques is where you will find amazing used furniture and antiques in Wake County, North Carolina. We have furniture from a wide variety of eras and styles. Craze is a family-owned and operated business. Delivery is available so please ask us for details.
